name: Smead Organizer, Organized Up 8-Pocket Letter Size Folder, Vertical Multi Pocket File Organizer, Durable Poly, Tabs, Black, for School, Home and Office Documents
short_description: 8-POCKET ORGANIZER FOR PROJECTS: Multi pocket folder with eight stacked pockets to separate subjects, clients or project stages so you can flip through papers quickly and find what you need.
LETTER SIZE STORAGE WITH HIGH CAPACITY: Holds up to 50 sheets in each pocket, giving you room for up to 400 letter-size pages and making it a smart choice for homework, reports and office paperwork.
DURABLE POLY MATERIAL RESISTS WEAR: Made of tough polypropylene that is tear resistant, water resistant and easy to wipe clean, so this organizer stands up to daily use in backpacks and briefcases.

VERTICAL DESIGN FITS BAGS AND BACKPACKS: Slim, upright profile slides neatly into school bags, totes and laptop cases, keeping documents upright and helping prevent pages from getting bent or crumpled.

TABBED POCKETS WITH PROFESSIONAL LOOK: Each pocket includes a built-in tab for labeling contents, and the textured black cover provides a polished, professional appearance for school, home or office use.
product_description: The Smead Organized Up Multi Pocket Organizer gives you flexible, space-saving storage for school, home and office paperwork. Designed with eight stacked pockets, this letter size folder lets you separate projects, classes or clients while keeping everything in one slim organizer. Each pocket holds up to 50 sheets of paper, providing generous capacity for handouts, reports, meeting notes and homework. The vertical design fits easily into backpacks, briefcases and totes, keeping documents upright and easy to reach when you are on the go. Durable polypropylene material is tear and water resistant, so it protects your papers from daily wear and occasional spills and wipes clean in seconds. Built-in tabs on each pocket allow you to label sections for quick identification, while the textured black front cover offers a clean, professional look that works just as well for students as it does for professionals. Use this multi pocket file organizer as a project folder, school supplies organizer or portable document folder, and pair it with Smead file folders and hanging file folders to keep your desk and filing cabinet just as organized as your bag.
product_details: Fastener Capacity ‎Assuming each pocket has a similar capacity, and considering the paper size and dimensions of the organizer, the fastener capacity could be around 50 sheets per pocket, resulting in a total capacity of 400 sheets for all 8 pockets.
